attributes.action: Change the Union Jack to represent wales.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have noticed that the flag of the uk is only made up of england, scotland and nourthern ireland and not wales,for about 3 hours today (11/05/07) I have been creating a new flag for great britian which represents wales. by combining the royal coat of arms with all of the flags so the welsh do not feel left out if you see what i mean.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
